Question: Harbor Lockers CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Harbor Lockers

Product: On-Demand Locker Marketplace

- Pay-per-use model with no need to purchase lockers
- Public locker network for increased retail and customer engagement
- Fine-tuned system amplified by smart locker manufacturing experts Luxer One
- Harbor Connect developer ecosystem for easy-to-build applications
- Ottobot Lockers for first and last-mile delivery showcased at CES 2024
